message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $8,000. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this item at a special price of $7,200. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-value asset at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
